testcase.name: Search for Audi cars on homepage search box
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to Autotrader homepage.....................................passed And autotrader logo is displayed............................................passed When I enter postcode as "OL9 8LE"..........................................passed And a "Within 30 miles" is selected from postcode...........................passed And "Audi" is selected from make dropdown...................................passed And "A3" is selected from model dropdown....................................passed And "5500" is selected from min price dropdown..............................passed And "22500" is selected from max price dropdown.............................passed And I click on search button................................................passed Then the search result for "Audi" is displayed..............................passed And all the cars displayed are "Audi".......................................passed
